name: Word-guessing Game
description:
This is a student project game. 

⚫  Overview
An interactive word-guessing game that requires teamwork.
⚫  Platform
Zoom
⚫  Setup
1 host & 4 players
Four players will be divided into two groups.
- Each group has a performer and an observer.
- Performers must turn on their camera and turn off their microphone.
- Observers and the host should at least turn on the microphone
